summary: Provides a Qt-based modal window that lets users view, refresh, and resolve duplicate files detected in the media library. The dialog displays duplicate counts, allows selection of files to keep or remove, and integrates with the duplicate registry and mirror‑entries functionality to update the library state.
business_intent: Enable end‑users to clean up duplicate media files, reducing storage waste and preventing inconsistencies in the library by offering an interactive interface for duplicate detection and resolution.
